title: Retina 15 2013 IOAcceleratorFamily2 error
message:
This board shuts down randomely, no idea where the problem is, through the console i can see that the last log was related to IOAcceleratorFamily2.

How do i log the exact crash report?

title: Retina 15 2013 IOAcceleratorFamily2 error
message: Random shutdowns usually write nothing to the logs as it is instant power off. Is this a early 2013? If yes the resolder U8900.

title: Retina 15 2013 IOAcceleratorFamily2 error
message: No it's a late 2013, this is a 16GB board with GPU so i don't want to give up on it yet.

title: Retina 15 2013 IOAcceleratorFamily2 error
message: Same shit, just called U9300 on this board.
